customize.text: Talk to Pekkani in the middle of the bay at <color=#ece5d8>Hiisli Island</color>
Teleport to either of the <color=#ece5d8>Hiisli Island</color> Teleport Waypoints and go to the location

Talk to Pekkani to start the quest
Quest Objective: Investigate nearby disturbances
Quest Objective: Place the fragment(s) on the stone
"Grab a stone fragment" and "Erect the pillars" can be done in any order, but after a stone fragment is obtained, it must be placed inside the main stone as shown in the final image.
Grab a stone fragment in the open
Hit a nearby Atapetra Conch to enter Empowered State
Interact with a fragment to obtain it (2 fragments can be obtained this way.)
Go near the main stone and put the fragment inside
Erect the pillars and grab a stone fragment
Go near the Moonlane to enter Empowered State
Use the power to move the two pillars and erect them as shown in 2nd and 3rd images
Interact with the fragment inside the Moon Mirror to grab it
Use Moonlane to transport the fragment to the main stone. (The player will exit the Moonlane in the middle, they can hit a nearby Atapetra Conch, then, to be able to grab the fragment again).
Go near the main stone and place the fragment inside
